Name: Start
Description: You are super thirsty and are dying for a drink. There are two off licenses to choose from. Which do you fancy?

EventOptions.Description: The one with the guy who loves TV.
The one where you always feel like you are being watched.

Name: An unfortunate result
Description: You are murdered to death and kind of regret it.

Name: That went ok
Description: You buy your booze and live a happy and contented life. You cant help but feel that choice was more important that it appeared.

Name: Round2
Description: You are kind of thirsty again, what a a thrilling life. Where to this time?

EventOptions.Description: The one with the guy who loves TV, seems to have a new red decour.
The usual. 6 pack of Fosters please.
The usual. But there's someone else in there...

Name: Awk
Description: The person looks okay, but you'd have to squeeze past them

EventOptions.Description: Go to the red place over the road
Stride in, order what your feelings tell you to

Name: Pina
Description: [For the full user experience please visit https://goo.gl/LX4XJP ]
